Recommendations: concrete evidence to substantiate filed documents should be made available to allow validation and authenticity a portfolio of both academic and nonacademic pictorials with captions showing internalization of vmgo be made available for reference
the final copy of the revised vmgo should be consistently used in all documents posters and the like
a tagalog translation of the vmgo may contribute to its wider dissemination a weeklymonthly ontheair mmsu sa radyo broadcast may facilitate delivery of its mandated mission to the grassroots
